citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 p.m. on
17-Dec-18. An individual stated no responsible adult was available for inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Unck Autumn, Veterinary Medical Officer
